title: "Beyond Steps RL"
---


**Beyond Steps RL** symbolizes the ambition to go beyond conventional boundaries in reinforcement learning (RL). The name reflects the integration of cutting-edge RL techniques with robotic locomotion, especially focusing on quadrupedal robots. It emphasizes innovation, exploration, and the pursuit of advancements that push RL applications beyond mere movementâ€”toward solving real-world challenges with precision and adaptability.
